thread.title: Romana Food Blockchain Corp. completes acquisition due-diligence of Michelis Egidio SNC.

author: cnbc.com
title: Romana Food Blockchain Corp. completes acquisition due-diligence of Michelis Egidio SNC.

organizations.name: about romana food blockchain corp romana food blockchain corp

text:
OAKVILLE, ON, Feb. 21, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Romana Food Blockchain Corp. (OTC: RFBC) The board of directors are pleased to announce the completion of the due-diligence for Michelis Egidio SNC.
The board of directors have instructed senior management to perform a final visit in the month of March to meet all of the employees and management of Michelis.
The acquisition of Michelis Egidio SNC is expected to add $23 million USD in revenue for the company.
Romana Food Blockchain Crop and Michelis Egidio SNC expect the acquisition to take place on or before April 30, 2018.
About Romana Food Blockchain Corp
Romana Food Blockchain Corp is an emerging leader in the authentic Italian Food sector. The Company is in the process of acquiring food processing plants specializing in Italian products. It is currently in the final stages of acquiring plants in North America and in Italy.
